stories.text:
Hi guys!

I'm the founder of ARCTOS (https://arctoscreative.com), a digital agency that creates design and web solutions for startups.

I'm still building my productized service for SaaS, Startups, Pre-Seed, and Seed level companies, and of course, I'm always looking for the best way to serve my customers. Right now I'm using Clickup and Airtable–when it comes to Social Media Posts Approval–but I'm looking for better solutions.

Basically, once my customer subscribes to one of our tiers, he/she will be redirected with instructions on how to submit all the requests.

Customers may do this by Email (Using Zendesk) or Clickup, maybe Airtable. What do you think is the best option when it comes to Web Design and Development? Please, leave your comment of your suggestion and experience.
stories.title: Submit Unlimited Requests via Email or Clickup, which is one better for YOU?

stories.text:
I am looking for a standard that describes the precise definition for mathematical symbols and notation.

Is there a widely accepted, precise standard for this like there is standard for the C language?

Obviously, I am no mathematician :-)
stories.title: Ask HN: Where are the “docs” for mathematical notation?
